alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel; Howard; Montgomery; Prince Georges (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 22 at 5:00PM EDT until May 22 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ANNE ARUNDEL...SOUTHEASTERN HOWARD...EAST CENTRAL MONTGOMERY AND NORTH CENTRAL PRINCE GEORGES COUNTIES... At 459 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Columbia, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Severn, Elkridge, Glen Burnie, Severna Park, Odenton, Laurel, Pasadena, Lake Shore, Fort Meade, Green Haven, Savage-guilford, South Gate, Scaggsville, Ilchester, Burtonsville, Jessup, Savage, Gambrills and Herald Harbor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Anne Arundel; Howard; Montgomery; Prince Georges
